description: This file defines a React functional component named SearchBar, which provides a user interface for searching recipes with filters such as query, cuisine, and maximum cook time. It manages internal state for these filters and triggers an onChange callback upon form submission.

methods.name: SearchBar
methods.description: React functional component for rendering a search and filter bar for recipes

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission, preventing default behavior and invoking onChange with current filter values
